page.title: 09MUSLIM GIRL:AISHA HUSSAIN.
page.content: My name is{Aisha}and I am 11 years of age.I have lived in Blackburn all my life.My parents were born in{Pakistan} and came to live in this country 12 years ago.I wear a{panjabisuit}which is a full dress going down to my knees and trousers underneath which cover my legs .These suits are usually very {brightly coloured.}Once a year we celebrate{Eid}and have a holiday from school.It is the most important{ {religious festival}for{muslims}.Our mothers make lots of lovely things to eat.We{eat}rice,chicken,custard with peanuts and coconuts in,samousa(made from dille,meat and potatoes)and many more spicy foods.I spend my day at school from 9.00am to 3.30pm.In the{ {evening}I go to the{mosque}where I learn about own religion from the Quran.The Q uran is our {holy book}and is written in {arabic.}
